original_text:
he sets on high those who are lowly,
    and those who mourn are lifted to safety.
korean_text: 낮은 자를 높이 드시고 애곡하는 자를 일으키사 구원에 이르게 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: he sets on high those who are lowly
and those who mourn are lifted to safety
sentences.korean_translation: 슬퍼하는 자들을 안전한 곳으로 들어 올리시며
